double bdsp::filter::LP2_SallenKey_TPT::process ( double  x)

Definition at line 31 of file LP2_SallenKey_TPT.cpp.

32  {
33  // Calculate input to low-pass chain
34 
35  const double s_bar = (lp[0].get_state() * gm1 + lp[1].get_state()) / (1.0 + g);
36  const double u = (x - k * s_bar) / (1 + k * g2mg);
37 
38  // Calculate output by processing low-pass chain
39 
40  double y = u;
41 
42  for (int n = 0; n < 2; ++n)
43  {
44  y = lp[n].process(y);
45  }
46 
47  return y;
48  }

52  g = cutoff / sample_rate;
